item.title: Neutrality Guidelines
item.description: Neutral nations cannot ally with other nations in aggressive pacts without losing neutrality. Nations cannot send overtly threatening or agitating messages without losing neutrality Nations cannot become neutral until 1 week after participation in a war. Nations must wait 1 week after revoking neutrality before taking any hostile actions. All Nations must publicly announce neutrality in #news (In discord). Nations must do /n toggle peaceful (costs 80p) to be considered fully neutral.

item.title: War Rules
item.description: Both Leaders must submit a #towny-war-tickets (In discord) UNLESS an effective Casus Belli (Below) is applied to one ticket (with higher staff review) Nations that are set to Neutral cannot be brought into any war All wars must be announced 48hrs in advance Cobelligerents/Allies must be declared in the tickets All leaders involved in a war must also present a case for war to staff BEFORE ticket is approved.
